name: Classic Georgian Khachapuri
description: A traditional Georgian dish of soft bread filled with melted cheese and topped with a runny egg. A savory national treasure!
keywords: khachapuri, georgian food, cheese bread, traditional recipe

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine flour, yeast, sugar, and salt. Add warm milk and mix until dough forms.
Knead the dough and let it rise for 1 hour.
Roll out the dough into an oval shape and place the cheese mixture in the center.
Fold and twist the sides to form a boat shape, then bake at 220Â°C for 20 minutes.
Crack an egg into the center and bake for another 5 minutes. Serve hot!
